name: Access Control
description: WebWaka Digital Operating System - Access Control Agent (Agent 36) Multi-Factor Authentication and Role-Based Access Control  This agent provides comprehensive access control with multi-factor authentication, role-based access control, granular permissions, and Ubuntu philosophy integration for community-centered security and traditional governance.  Features: - Multi-factor authentication (SMS, TOTP, biometric, hardware tokens) - Role-based access control (RBAC) with Ubuntu hierarchy - Granular permissions and resource-level access control - Ubuntu philosophy integration for community-based access - Traditional governance and elder authority recognition - African infrastructure optimization - Real-time access monitoring and audit trails
dependencies: from typing import Dict, List, Optional, Tuple, Any
